data.description:
Challenge yourself to drink more water for better health! Health experts recommend drinking at least a half gallon (8 cups) of water every day. Drinking enough water can help you lose weight by controlling your appetite, boosting your metabolism, and aiding your digestion.

Is 8 cups a day too easy for you? Aim for a whole gallon of water! In the 30-day water challenge, you challenge yourself to drink a gallon of water every day for 30 days straight. People who have completed this challenge report a wide range of beneficial results, such as weight loss, more energy, less headaches, better mood, softer hair, and healthier looking skin.

With Gallon Challenge, you can help yourself drink more water by keeping count of how much water you drink each day, and how many days in a row you've met your goal. The app also keeps track of statistics such as the total amount of water you've recorded consuming and the length of your longest streak.

You can customize your drinking goal to be either a half gallon or whole gallon of water each day. The unit that you drink in can be customized to either ounces, cups, pints, or quarts. You can change the hour that your day starts at in case you have an irregular schedule.

New in version 2! Set reminders to drink water. You can either choose how often you want to be reminded, or use Auto reminders to let the app evenly space them out throughout the day to keep you on track for reaching your goal. These reminders won't bother you while you sleep, because it uses your "End of Day" setting to know approximately what time you are asleep.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed a bug where auto reminder went off too often if you used a custom drinking unit.

data.description:
Pebble based epileptic seizure detector to warn a carer that someone is experiencing a tonic-clonic seizure. Uses an associated Application that runs on an Android phone to raise alarms. Version 2 of the App allows the user to mute the alarms if they are doing an activity that would otherwise generate alarms, and to raise an alarm manually (by pressing and holding the UP and DOWN buttons respectively).

 If anyone with a Pebble has an interest in epilepsy, I would appreciate you having a look at this app and feeding back your thoughts!

data.description:
Why PlexFit ?
PlexFit is the most customizable and the most comprehensive fitness tracking solution available today on the Pebble. It has walking, sleeping, running and biking and more. It also syncs all the fitness data to Google Fit, making it a hard-to-beat solution if you have an Android phone.



Key Features
• The only fitness tracker that fully supports the whole Pebble line-up (Pebble Classic, Pebble Time, Pebble Time Round)

• A complete fitness tracking solution: all fitness tracking features have been implemented (walking, sleeping, running, biking), inactivity alert, etc... so you do not need to install separate apps to do all of these.

• Seamless integration with Google Fit platform (now with MyFitnessPal support)

• The most customizable fitness tracker available for the Pebble today.

• Background data collection so that users do not need to have their app opening all the times

• App is fully compliant with Material Design and use the latest design cues available for Material Design guidelines

• Stylishly designed Pebble Watchface to make you stand out in any circumstances


Words from the Developers
We have spent a lot of time and many sleepless nights to develop this app. This app was designed to empower the users and to allow you to have more control over your fitness data. Please enjoy it as much as we have enjoyed creating it.



Contact
For any support or inquiry, please email plexfit.software@gmail.com



Our website
http://bidusoft.blogspot.com/

data.description:
Ever wanted to check up on SickBeard from your wrist? Well now you can!

PebbleBeard uses the SickBeard API to interface with your server. Easily check what is airing today, soon and later as well as see what is downloading and perform tasks on SickBeard.

Features:
 - View shows airing today, soon and later.
 - View missed shows.
 - View recently snatched and downloaded.
 - Manually post process downloads.
 - Force search for missed episodes. (Works on some versions of SB)

Works with the official branch of SickBeard and most features work on other forks. If you are using a non official branch, some features may not work.

Disclaimer: piracy is bad.

Shows was previously PebbleBeard.

data.description:
Keep track of time and score with this pocket sized scoreboard. Whether you're playing Pool with a friend or the referee in a game of soccer, Tiny Scoreboard helps you out. Tiny Scoreboard features everything you would expect from a normal scoreboard:
	- Stop, start, reset and edit your time
	- And a score! (duh)
	- Customize your scoreboard in the settings menu (New!)
It also keeps track of time and score when you exit the application!

Tiny ScoreBoard controls
Don't be discouraged by this wall of text! You only really need to know the first five functions. The rest should become pretty obvious.

While time is selected and stopped:
	- Top: Start time
	- Middle: Select score
	- Down: Edit time
	- Hold Top: Reset time
	- Hold Middle: Reset score
	- Hold Down: Enter settings menu (New!)
While time is selected and started 
	- Top: Stop time
	- Middle: Select score
While score is selected:
	- Top: Add 1 to the home team score
	- Middle: Select time
	- Down: Add 1 to the visiting team score
	- Hold Top: Subtract 1 from the home team score
	- Hold Down: Subtract 1 from the visiting team score
While editing time:
	- Top: Add a minute
	- Middle: submit the selected time amount
	- Down: Subtract a minute

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed a bug where the app crashes when re-entering the app with time running

data.description:
Are you a pilot with a Pebble? Use this app to keep track of switching between left and right tanks of your airplane.

Instructions: use up/down keys to select tank timer interval, then click select button to proceed. On the "miniature airplane" screen, use top button to select left wing, and bottom button to select right wing. Select button will pause/unpause. Press and hold the select button to reset. If you leave the app while it's running, it will re-open when it's time to switch tanks. After 24 hours, the app always auto-resets.

Open source, and pull requests are accepted.

(header image credit: http://bit.ly/1CclfyF)

(NOTE: This is a hobby project, and not a piece of approved avionics. Please use responsibly and have a backup flow.)

latest_release.release_notes: Version 2 -- Now for Pebble Color. Lets you exit the app while the timer is running, and will re-start the app when the timer runs out to notify you to switch tanks.

data.description:
Pebble SOS is an emergency SMS service which sends out a virtual cry for help upon user request. To send an SOS request, simply press the select button once, and a safety contact will receive a text message with your latitude and longitude coordinate as well as a Google map link with your location inputted. This goal of this app is to give people whom are injured to the point of limited movement, the ability to call for help. Useful purposes for this app include:
•	skiing / snowboarding / mountain biking / etc. 
•	camping / rock climbing / trail tracking / etc.
•	Tracking your children (see where they really are)
•	tracking parked vehicles
•	Meeting others at outdoor events
•	Hide and seek daredevils

Get the scheduled time of the next bus available based on the proximity to the closest stop, according to the Cape Town MyCiTi transport services.

Feel free to send comments or suggestions to improve this app.
This app is unofficial and not endorsed by MyCiTi or the City of Cape Town.

data.description:
Check out our new app Get Me There! Supporting many cities worldwide now with buses and all transit realtime correction!  For more information, check out GetMeThereTransitApp.com


Realtime Philadelphia rapid rail transit information.  Uses user's location to determine nearest 5 stations and displays realtime departure times from each.  Lines include the Market Frankford Line, Broad Street Line, Broad-Ridge Spur, PATCO High Speed Line, Regional Rail (Between Jefferson and University City).

With update 1.1 you may now select two regional rail stations and view trains traveling between them. You can also set a line as a favorite and have it displayed at the top of the list when in range. (These are premium features)

An update in the near future will add support for the Norristown High Speed Line as well as Trolley Routes.

Check: chrisschlitt.com/PhillyTransit for more information.

Disclaimer: Trip Planning Data and Stop Information belongs to SEPTA and PATCO.  Philly Transit is in no way associated with SEPTA, PATCO, or any transit authority.

latest_release.release_notes: -Added automatic refresh every 10 seconds

data.title: Philly Transit

data.description:
Zastávkové odjezdy pro MHD v rámci DPMB, IDS-JMK (integrovaného dopravního systému Jihomoravského kraje).

Po spuštění najde v okolí zastávky, hned vybere tu nejbližší a zobrazí nejbližší odjezdy z jednotlivé zastávky podobně, jako je to občas vidět na svítících červených cedulích.
Je-li v okolí více zastávek, můžete si je vybrat (pro vyšší rychlost a pohodlí samo skáče na nejbližší).
Je-li pro danou zastávku více stanovišť v různých směrech, vyberete si požadovaný směr.

Aplikace využívá informace systému Kordis IDS-JMK, který je na adrese www.idsjmk.cz/Map/Map.aspx

data.description:
Get google maps directions right on your wrist. No companion app required. 

Features : 
- Search for places around you
- Save a place in your favourite and find it later
- More than 25 different kind of places : Airport, Bar, Cafe, Hospitals, Dentist, Clothing store, Movie theater, Night clubs, Restaurant ...
- Use any of the 4 modes from : Public Transport, Driving, Walking, Bicycling
- Specify preferences : Bus, Tram, Rail, Subway, Fewer steps, Less walking ...
- Choose from up to 10 different routes
- Low battery life impact
- No companion app required
- Available in both kilometers and miles

It is time for a better Directions for Pebble. If you like this app as much as I do and want to put it to the next level, join me here : https://directions.uservoice.com/ Post your ideas and I will make sure to implement the most popular ones.

Are you a dev ? Directions is public on Github if you want to help. http://sncs.io/directionsOnGithub

Google Maps charges me for the usage of the API. If you like the app please consider making a donation (website link bellow). Thank you :)

data.description:
If you sail or race on Sydney harbour, you should find this app useful!  

It is a browser on your wrist that you can use to display weather data in a watch friendly format. You need to configure the app before use by going to the Settings screen & pressing the Default button

Once configured, it can provide constantly updated measurements from 3 Sydney Harbour weather stations some 3 south of Sydney (so you can watch a southerly change approaching!).  If you select bom.gov.au, updates are provided about every 10 minutes.  Data is displayable from North Head, Sydney Harbour, Fort Denison, Syndey Airport, Wattamolla, Belambi & Pt Perpendicular.

It will also display the current forecast if properly configured. Sydney Closed Waters is the default.  Note that since some text is abbreviated to attempt to fit in available space on the Pebble, the source web site should be relied on for a current and accurate forecast.

Scroll up & down the 7 stations using the UP & DOWN buttons.

Display the latest forecast with a single short press on the centre SELECT button.

Display the selected tide forecast with a double click on the centre SELECT button.

Manually request fresh weather data with a long press on the centre SELECT button.  The app will automatically request the current weather every 10 minutes - this function allows you to request an update on demand.

Caution - if left active on a mobile data connection, it will use approximately 12MB per day.  It does not retrieve data when the watchapp is not displayed.

Data you access is for your personal use only.

latest_release.release_notes: Remove debug message!

data.title: Sydney Harbour Weather and Tide Browser

data.author: iValueHealth.NET
data.description:
Health for Everyone: Access to basic health information, services and connecting people in just 2 clicks.

iValueHealth.NET is a health related white-labelled multilingual platform where users can access basic medical information, health applications and connect with healthcare professionals in just 2 clicks. World's first & leader in connecting the healthcare ecosystem in one place. It has more than 700k members & more than million visitors per month. 

The portal has three types of content: (1) Medical Information on medicine field, symptoms, diseases and medications (2) Healthcare professionals can publish and share articles (text, images and videos) about what’s going on, best practices, trends, research work etc. (3) eHealth and mHealth applications and services for B2B & B2C. The website currently has more than 50+ services and a road-map of 100+ services to be launched by end of year.

MedicOnline Soluciones - http://beta.ivaluehealth.net/
data.title: iValueHealth.NET

data.description:
Control a Samsung Smart TV from your wrist!

Supports: all Samsung Smart TVs from before 2014, newer TVs from 2014 or later (H-series or later) are NOT supported due to Samsung not allowing this anymore!

Setup: install the companion app, open it and enter the TV IP address.

Demonstration of the app: https://youtu.be/OdS6BVVKP1M (or use the website button below).

A new version with automatic TV finding support and support for the newer Pebble watches is almost finished, however due to the recent changes in the Pebble company I'm not planning to finish it completely and release it. If you really want it however, let me know and if there is enough interest, I will look into it.
